bill_title: provide for certain voting and attendance information to be made available by the director of the Legislative Research Council.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for certain voting and attendance information to be made available by the director of the Legislative Research Council. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 2-9 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The director shall provide data that includes the voting and attendance information for each member of the Legislature and each legislative session of the Legislature. The data under this section shall be available to the public on the website maintained by the Legislative Research Council in a format that is able to be saved by the public to a computer and that is searchable and sortable by name, date, legislative session, bill number, and legislation sponsorship and cosponsorship. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
